tags: None
review: He is a young doctor *** *** ********* ** **** ******** *** ********* my six month old baby had a lot ofcough n cold .. He was very reassuring and comforting he cleared all my doubts and fears n prescribed my daughter a regular paracetamol and meds to expell the cough out instead of prescribing heavy antibiotics which have a lot of side and after effects.. The doc said that he would prefer giving antibiotics only if it was the last resort after he tried every thing else  .. we visited his new clinic near Deonar which was very nice and well equipped.. he is a very good doctor and I would recommend him to my friends who have babies also
reply_text: Thank you so much :)

tags: None
review: 14 day old baby was down with very high fever (105.5 deg.F) and weighing approx. 1.9kgs only. We rushed the baby to Dr.Bakul Parekh's Hospital late in the night. The baby was immediately admitted in the NICU and immediate treatment was administered. The baby was very critical. Dr.Vivasvan Parekh and his team are highly efficient and they handled the baby with great expertise. The baby recuperated very well and is now normal. Dr. VIvasvan Parekh is a very good doctor and a fine gentleman. He is very polite and communicated very nicely with us and kept us well informed of the progress of the child.  Thank you Doctor
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Vivasvan was fantastic & gave utmost care to my son.He was proactive to give lot of valuable information. On the follow up day, as it was raining heavily- I had to call him to request him extend his shift as we were getting late.he obliged showing great sympathy n care. Wonderful person **** **** ********* ** *********

I wud also like to mention about Dr Ram Chaudhary , he is part of his panel. He is also fantastic n very reliable. You can call him at any time of the day & he will answer Ur call to give proper positive response.
Person who is humble with loads of experience.

God bless everyone in bakul Parekh for this invaluable service to humanity.
reply_text: Many thanks for your feedback :)

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
*** ******** ** **** ***** i took my 3 year old daughter for fever and cough, he treated her very well, he makes child very comfortable, and he is very polite and down to earth person.
He gives very minimum medcines and results are very good.
i recommend dr vivasvan to everyone now.
reply_text: Thank you!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: We recently came back from U.K. and were not sure about which doctor would be good for our baby. Dr. Parekh was easy to talk to and his explanation of issues and treatment options was thorough. He gave us enough time and was open to suggestions. The facility is also well kept; very neat and clean. We will visit again.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback :)

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
He is trust worthy...No doubt but one thing I would suggest is please allow staff to call Dr on request as we are in touch with 1 Dr and follow the same  and some time other Dr's are attending the patient no doubt all Dr 's are good enough but only for aur satisfaction I would suggest the above....!!!
Thanks...!!!
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The clinic is not just like any other clinic, it has a bright lighting all over and.makes you feel fresh. The doc is very friendly and knows how to tackle children's. Children's would cry very minimum during vaccination due to the environment. Highly recommended.
reply_text: Thank you for your feedback :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Though the Doctor is very good, child friendly, courteous however I had a very bad experience while I visited Dr. Bakul Parekh hospital for my childs vaccination. The hospital authority asked 3% extra (over and above vaccination charges) if i wish to pay by swiping my credit / debit card. Even after informing them its illegal, they were least bothered and told me to take this matter up with whomsoever I want. This forced me to look for ATM where I could use my card to withdraw the funds and pay. Unfortunately, in couple of nearby ATMs, the card didn't work and cash wasn't there, I had to walk for atleast 15-20 mins (one way) to withdraw the cash.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback and I have looked into the matter and changed it. I apologise for the inconvenience caused to you. We hope to serve you better the next time :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Excellent doctor really satisfied with his treatment I always recommend dr vivasvan Parekh for any health issues of my both children Zoya(2.5yrs) and Huzaifa (10yrs) last year my son huzaifa got a fits attack he was admitted in ICU for one day in his Ghatkopar hsptl really satisfied with his treatment and the medicine recommend by him was very helpful all the neurologist doctor also recommend me the same medicine given by dr vivasvan Parekh I was really grateful for all the best treatment given by him to my son. My son is likes him very much only one visit and meeting with him he got fully recovered and refresh.
But in this lockdown period I found it very difficult to visit his clinic. And I hope he will answer my queries on phone.as he always do 
All the doctors in his Ghatkopar hsptl really appreciated with the care they give.thankyou doctor...
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words! You can always call me in time of need :)

review: Dr. Vivasan Parekh first make the patient and his family member calm and then he explains what's d cause and how to treat the disease. Best part he explains to you a friend a family member and not the way as a routine doctor would do. Any emergency patient he takes the consent from the current under diagnosis patient, explains the criticality and attends the critical patient. Doesn't difference rich or poor patient based on critical issues he attends. Also,  is very humble n caring towards his staff, never seen him shouting on other patients.. Cool doctor. You can blindly trust him and leave the patient in his care to recover and be happy on their feet again... Godfrey D'silva
reply_text: Thank you for your heart warming feedback :)

review:
The waiting time was more then a hour as all doctor had gone for rounds as 4 new baby was in incubator. But at least one doctor should be checking the patient who have to check for their baby as very hard to keep them quiet for more than half hour
Else Dr are good
reply_text: Unfortunately we have to prioritize ourself to serious patients admitted under our care and with so many serious children admitted on the said day, all the doctors were caught up in saving them. This is a one off situation and i personally apologised to all my patients for making them wait before treating them.
